title: Alternative dispute resolution
context: ยง508D-18 Alternative dispute resolution. If the real estate purchase contract provides for alternative dispute resolution, then prior to filing an action in any court to enforce this chapter, a seller or buyer shall first submit the claim to alternative dispute resolution as required in the real estate purchase contract. [L 1994, c 214, pt of ยง2; am L 1996, c 161, ยง18]
